quest.name: Way of the Goldsmith
journal: Jemime would have you reaffirm your desire to join the Goldsmiths' Guild.
The receptionist bids you present yourself to Serendipity, the young lady in charge of the guild. Seek her out and show her your burning desire to become a goldsmith.

Mistress Serendipity eagerly accepts you into the fold, and gifts you with a weathered chaser hammer. With the new tool of your trade in hand, speak to your guildmaster once more to begin your journey as a goldsmith.

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: Before you can embark upon your journey to become a goldsmith, you must first seek an audience with our guildmaster. Are you ready to do so?

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: You shall find Mistress Serendipity on the workshop floor, just down the steps.

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: Show her your burning desire to learn, and you are certain to receive her permission to join.

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: Nervous, are we? I find slow, deep breaths calm the nerves. See if that works for you, and let me know when you are ready to meet the guildmaster.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Stop right there, you little troublemaker! People are working here!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh! Pardon me, I had you mistaken for a mammet. For a moment there I─

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: <sigh> Let's start over, shall we? What brings you here today, adventurer? Do you perchance have aspirations to become a goldsmith?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Have you aspirations to become a goldsmith?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Sorry, sorry. My mistake, it's been a long day. I don't ordinarily mind visitors, but I'm afraid I'm very busy at the moment. If you would excuse me...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: That's great! Welcome, welcome! I'm Serendipity, but you can call me Sera.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Sorry, I'm still unaccustomed to this whole “guildmaster” business... Ah, right! What did you say your name was again? AdrianApollo?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, right─Forename Surname! Well then, Forename Surname! Work hard and one day your creations may line the shelves at Eshtaime's Aesthetics. Trust in yourself and you can achieve anything!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: That was sufficiently inspiring, I trust?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Good! Next order of business: here is your new chaser hammer. Well...I say “new,” but it's actually a bit weathered.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But never you mind that! Just show me that you know how to hold it so we can get started.

obj.n: So You Want to Be a Goldsmith
